languages.text: "И в этом должно нам уподобиться {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Ему{/g}". {n}Мужчина кивает вам.{/n} "Приветствую верн{mf|ого|ую} слугу Владыки Человечества. Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель высокочтимого Ордо Ксенос Инквизиции Императора. С кем имею честь?"

traits.locale_text: "И в этом должно нам уподобиться {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Ему{/g}". {n}Мужчина кивает вам.{/n} "Приветствую верн{mf|ого|ую} слугу Владыки Человечества. Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель священного Ордо Ксенос Инквизиции Императора. С кем имею честь?"

languages.text: "And in this, we must be like {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Him{/g}." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"
languages.original_text: "И в этом должно нам уподобиться {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Ему{/g}". {n}Мужчина кивает вам.{/n} "Приветствую верн{mf|ого|ую} слугу Владыки Человечества. Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель высокочтимого Ордо Ксенос Инквизиции Императора. С кем имею честь?"

traits.locale_text: "And in this, we must be like Him." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's Holy Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure?"

"And in this, we must be like Him." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's Holy Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure?"

"And in this, we must be like Him." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's Holy Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

"And in this, we must be like Him." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's Holy Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

"And in this, we must be like {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Him{/g}." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's Holy Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

"And in this, we must be like {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Him{/g}." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

languages.text: “而在这点上，我们必须以{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}祂{/g}为榜样。”{n}这个人向你点了点头。{/n}“向你致意，人类之主的仆人。我是帝国审讯官海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，来自神圣异形审判庭。我很荣幸与你交谈，请问你是哪位？”
languages.original_text: "And in this, we must be like {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Him{/g}." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: “而在这点上，我们必须以{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}祂{/g}为榜样。”{n}这个人向你点了点头。{/n}“向你致意，人类之主的仆人。我是帝国审讯官海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，来自神圣异形审判庭。我很荣幸与你交谈，请问你是哪位？”

languages.text: 「そしてこの渦中にあって、我らは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}主{/g}のようにあらねばなりません」{n}男はあなたに向かってうなずく。{/n}「人類の盟主のしもべたる同胞よ、ご挨拶申し上げます。我は帝国の異端審問庁、栄誉ある『純血の団』のインテロゲイター、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスです。失礼ですが、そちらは何者でしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "And in this, we must be like {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Him{/g}." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: 「そしてこの渦中にあって、我らは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}主{/g}のようにあらねばならぬ。{n}男はあなたに向かってうなずく。{/n}「人類の盟主のしもべたる同胞よ、ご挨拶申し上げる。私は帝国の異端審問庁、神聖なる〈純血の団〉のハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックス。失礼だが、そちらは何者だ？」

languages.text: "Und wir müssen es {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Ihm{/g} gleichtun." {n}Der Mann nickt dir zu.{/n} "Ich grüße Euch, {mf|Diener|Dienerin} des Herren der Menschheit. Ich bin Interrogator Heinrix van Calox von der ehrwürdigen Ordo Xenos der imperialen Inquisition. Mit wem habe ich das Vergnügen?"
languages.original_text: "And in this, we must be like {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Him{/g}." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: "Und wir müssen es {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Ihm{/g} gleichtun." {n}Der Mann nickt dir zu.{/n} "Ich grüße Euch, {mf|Diener|Dienerin} des Herren der Menschheit. Ich bin Interrogator Heinrix van Calox von der heiligen Ordo Xenos der imperialen Inquisition. Mit wem habe ich das Vergnügen?"

languages.text: « Et en cela, nous devons l'imiter. » {n}L'homme vous adresse un hochement de tête.{/n} « Je vous salue, fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante} du {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Maître de l'Humanité{/g}. Je suis l'interrogateur Heinrix van Calox, du vénérable Ordo Xénos de l'Inquisition Impériale. À qui ai-je le plaisir de m'adresser ? »
languages.original_text: "And in this, we must be like {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Him{/g}." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: « Et en cela, nous devons l'imiter. »L'homme vous adresse un hochement de tête.{/n} « Je vous salue, fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante} du Maître de l'Humanité. Je suis l'interrogateur Heinrix van Calox, du Saint Ordo Xénos de l'Inquisition Impériale. À qui ai-je le plaisir de m'adresser ? »

languages.text: «Y en ese aspecto, debemos ser como {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}él{/g}». {n}El hombre asiente.{/n} «Le saludo como sirviente del Señor de la Humanidad. Soy el Interrogador Heinrix van Calox del Ordo Xenos de la Inquisición Imperial. ¿Con quién tengo el placer de hablar?».
languages.original_text: "And in this, we must be like {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Him{/g}." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: «Y a ese respecto, debemos ser como {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Él{/g}». {n}El hombre asiente.{/n} «Te saludo como sirviente del Amo de la Humanidad. Soy el interrogador Heinrix van Calox del Santo Ordo Xenos de la Inquisición Imperial. ¿Con quién tengo el placer de hablar?».

languages.original_text: "And in this, we must be like Him." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

languages.text: "Biz de bu hususta, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}O'nun{/g} gibi olmalıyız." {n}Adam, başıyla selam veriyor.{/n} "Selam olsun İnsanlığın Efendisi'nin hizmetkârı. Bendeniz, İmparatorluk Engizisyonu'ndan saygın Zeno Nizamı mensubu Sorgucu Heinrix van Calox. Kiminle konuşma şerefine nail oluyorum?"
languages.original_text: "And in this, we must be like {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Him{/g}." {n}The man nods to you.{/n} "My greetings to you, fellow servant of the Master of Mankind. I am Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: "Biz de bu hususta, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}O{/g}'nun gibi olmalıyız." {n}Adam, başıyla selam veriyor.{/n} "Selam olsun İnsanlığın Efendisi'nin hizmetkârı. Bendeniz, İmparatorluk Engizisyonu'ndan saygın Zeno Nizamı mensubu Sorgucu Heinrix van Calox. Kiminle konuşma şerefine nail oluyorum?"
